mapper.sql:
FROM member a where 1=1
and a.ifmmRegDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate} and a.ifmmModDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}
and a.ifmmId = #{shValue} and a.ifmmName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
and a.ifmmRating LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
and a.ifmmGender LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
and a.ifmmEmail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
and a.ifmmTel LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
and a.ifmmAddress LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shValue}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifmmSeq ,a.ifmmId ,a.ifmmName ,a.ifmmDob ,a.ifmmAdminNy ,a.ifmmRating ,a.ifmmGender ,a.ifmmEmail ,a.ifmmTel ,a.ifmmZipcode ,a.ifmmAddress ,a.ifmmDetailedAddress ,a.ifmmRegDate ,a.ifmmModDate ,a.ifmmDelNy FROM member a where 1=1 AND a.ifmmSeq = #{shSeq}
SELECT COUNT(*) From member where ifmmId = #{ifmmId}
select ifmmSeq ,ifmmId from member WHERE 1=1 and ifmmId = #{ifmmId}
select ifmmSeq ,ifmmId ,ifmmName ,ifmmAdminNy from member where 1=1 and ifmmId = #{ifmmId} and ifmmPwd = #{ifmmPwd}
